device.title: Select device
device.description: Choose the Olarm device you would like to integrate. If your device is not listed, please ensure you have enabled public API access in your Olarm account for that device.

data_description.select_device: The Olarm device you would like to integrate
data_description.load_zones_bypass: Useful if you bypass zones on your alarm system regularly

error.oauth_failed: OAuth authentication failed, please try again.

abort.oauth_unauthorized: OAuth authorization error while obtaining access token.
abort.missing_configuration: The component is not configured. Please follow the documentation.
abort.no_url_available: No URL available. For information about this error, [check the help section]({docs_url})
abort.oauth_data_missing: OAuth data is missing. Please restart the configuration flow.
abort.no_devices_found: No Olarm devices found in your account. Please ensure you have enabled public API access in your Olarm account for your device
